name: Classic Margherita Pizza
description: Traditional Italian pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, basil, and extra virgin olive oil.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Fresh Atlantic salmon fillet grilled to perfection with seasonal vegetables and lemon butter sauce.

name: Beef Wellington
description: Premium beef tenderloin wrapped in puff pastry with mushroom duxelles and prosciutto.

name: Lobster Thermidor
description: Classic French dish featuring lobster meat in a rich cream sauce with mushrooms and cheese.

name: Wagyu Beef Steak
description: A5 grade Japanese Wagyu beef steak with perfect marbling and melt-in-your-mouth tenderness.

name: Grilled Sea Bass
description: Fresh Mediterranean sea bass with herbs and lemon butter sauce.

name: Duck Confit
description: Slow-cooked duck leg in its own fat, served with crispy skin and seasonal vegetables.

name: Caviar Service
description: Premium Beluga caviar served with traditional accompaniments and blinis.

name: Fresh Oysters
description: Selection of fresh oysters served with mignonette sauce and lemon.

name: Pork Belly
description: Slow-roasted pork belly with crispy crackling and apple sauce.

name: Grilled Shrimp
description: Jumbo shrimp marinated in garlic and herbs, grilled to perfection.

name: Chicken Marsala
description: Classic Italian dish with chicken breast in Marsala wine sauce.

name: Ribeye Steak
description: Prime cut ribeye steak with perfect marbling and grilled vegetables.

name: Tuna Tartare
description: Fresh yellowfin tuna with avocado, sesame, and soy dressing.

name: Pork Tenderloin
description: Herb-crusted pork tenderloin with roasted vegetables.
